ygData.subject: [eqbards] How did you play when you were 15th?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys, I m new to this list and I was hoping I could get a little advice on play tactics. I have a 15th level bard as my secondary character and he s an
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys, I'm new to this list and I was hoping I could get a little advice
on play tactics. I have a 15th level bard as my secondary character and he's
an awesome change from my ranger and I'm trying to figure out how to play
him most effectivly. Lately I've been hunting orcs in Crushbone by meleeing
them and bellowing at them, it seemed to be working better than bringing up
Anthem for it's haste factor. I tried using the 15th level song to mez them
but it didn't seem to buy me anything in combat, it did help me escape a
training one afternoon though. Is there another way I should be playing the
encounters? Is there any place you'd recomend that would be hungry for a
bard to group at my level?

Reedwind
15th level bard
Bertoxx
